AUROC=0.6365627772848269	AUPRC=0.6790491930586608	Accuracy=0.5921052631578947	MCC=0.2114253911274495	Recall=0.40816326530612246	Precision=0.6722689075630253	f1_score=0.5079365079365079

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.56      0.79      0.65       184
        case       0.67      0.41      0.51       196

    accuracy                           0.59       380
   macro avg       0.61      0.60      0.58       380
weighted avg       0.62      0.59      0.58       380
